storyInfo: Hibiscus discovers the changes in the conditions of the Infected are related to Ebenholz and Kreide. She speaks out and tries to bar them from performing, and Ebenholz goes to confront Gertrude.

attributes.content: (Yawn)
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Coming, I'll be right there...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Hibiscus?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Good morning... You're up early today. It's barely light out––
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Where's Ebenholz?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hm? He's still asleep.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Your eyes are all bloodshot... Did you stay up all night?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: ––Wake him too. Hurry.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: False recovery?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I have no idea what you're trying to say.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Do you really not understand me, or are you just––
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Fine, I'll explain it one more time.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: The reason I came to the Afterglow was to investigate why the Infected people here were suddenly getting better.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: But according to our visits over the last few days, the Infected here in the Afterglow are not getting better, but exhibiting something called a 'false recovery.'
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: In other words, the patient's condition appears to be getting better, but in reality is taking a turn for the worse.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Why would they appear to be improving then if they're getting worse?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Let me explain it another way.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Generally speaking, whenever the body is injured, the best outcome is for it to 'return to its original state.'
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: If it is unable to return to its original state, the body will mobilize its non-damaged parts to cover for the functions lost through the injury, a process we call 'compensation.'
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Right now, most of the Infected in the Afterglow have activated their body's compensation functions, causing them to appear to be in very good shape.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: But inside them, where the eye cannot see, the severity of their Oripathy is rapidly getting worse.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: At the current rate, a certain cohort is about to enter the decompensation stage.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Decompensation?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Once the extent of the damage exceeds the body's maximum ability to compensate, the fragile equilibrium is broken and the patient quickly lapses into the acute exacerbation stage of Oripathy, where their condition deteriorates sharply and becomes life-threatening.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Actually, there are already people starting to enter the acute stage.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: How...?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: I get the gist of what you're talking about, but what does this have to do with––
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Wait, are you saying that Kreide is at risk too?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: That isn't the problem. Based on an analysis of our findings so... You and Kreide seem to be the primary factors behind this occurrence.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Kreide and I caused all of this?!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: That's complete nonsense!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: After analyzing your activities and movements, I've confirmed that you... or maybe something you're carrying, is strongly correlated with the incidence of false recovery.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: For example, the worker in the laundromat beside your residence said the day before that she 'felt especially good.' Her condition worsened dramatically last night, and she was nearly taken to hospice care.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I urge the two of you to cooperate with me. If you have any leads, please let me know right away! This is for the safety of everyone in the Afterglow!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: You can't think of anything at all?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Nothing's coming to mind.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Can the two of you come down to the office with me and let me check something real quick, just in case?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Judging by the markers, one of you is a completely healthy man, and the other is in the stable phase of Oripathy...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: How could this be...?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hibiscus, this time, it's the owner of a music shop behind Afterglow Hall!
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: ––How's the situation?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Thankfully, he signed an agreement with the hospital in the Cliffy Patio, and has already been picked up.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Another case of false recovery?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: That's right. Just yesterday afternoon, he reported 'no discomfort whatsoever.'
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: I'll go follow up, just to make sure the hospital doesn't find a way to renege on the agreement.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Those two...
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: I'll handle it.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Then I'll be off!
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: I have to ask again, is there anything you can think of?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Every moment is the difference between life and death, so please!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: How about this. Ebenholz, why don't you come with me first? Let's have a chat about this.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Kreide, would you mind waiting a bit inside?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Why'd you drag me out here by myself?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I apologize in advance if this comes off the wrong way, but...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I want you and Kreide to keep some distance from each other. The sooner, the better.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Why are you telling me this, and not him?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Do you suspect that I purposely caused this so-called 'false recovery?'
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: If only it were that simple, I'd be able to hand you straight to the Vyseheim authorities and that'd solve the root of the issue.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: But the incidents of false recovery started before you arrived, and Andante was the one who noticed. Otherwise, I wouldn't have come to the Afterglow, or even to Vyseheim.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Then why did you say that––
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Before I came? What about Kreide?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: The phenomenon of false recovery... began right after he arrived in Vyseheim.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: After he arrived in Vyseheim...? How could that be?!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: It was at roughly the same time Kreide arrived in the Afterglow. The indicators from a portion of the Infected here began to gradually improve.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: But his effect on the Infected was so miniscule at the time that nobody else noticed except the thorough and careful Andante.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: After the two of you met at the registration, Kreide's influence suddenly strengthened.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Based on the reports Andante submitted to the Rhodes Island landship, the situation would've taken at least half a year to deteriorate to its current state with just Kreide alone.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: After you arrived, in just a few days' time... We have the current situation on our hands.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I need you to explain to me what exactly is going on here.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: If you don't have an explanation, I'll need you to put things on hold before the situation spins out of control.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: So, I hope you'll leave the Afterglow, and Vyseheim, as quickly as possible.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: What about the concert?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: The concert? That's what matters to you?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: If the false recovery is caused by some sort of Arts, then your ensemble would amplify that, if anything––
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Wait... Could it be, that's your...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Stop.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I'll be frank. I hate nothing more than being unfairly accused.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: This isn't a problem that can be resolved by respecting your feelings!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I know!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: So, give me some time.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: How long do you need?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: If things go smoothly, just a few hours. If not...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: ...I don't know. But I promise I'll be back.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Alright, I'll trust you this once.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I... I don't agree to this.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Ebenholz worked so hard to perform in the concert, and finally managed to win over Herr Czerny... It'd be a travesty if he just walked away at this point!
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: You're missing the bigger picture! We're talking about peoples' lives here!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Ebenholz?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Ebenholz, where are you going?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Ebenholz!
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: You look like you're all out of breath. Did you run the entire way here?
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: I'd urge you not to seek me out in this manner. The risk of being exposed is––
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: Exposed?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Things are starting to go pear-shaped, and that's what you're worried about?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I want to ask you something. Does the Resonanz from your so-called Voice of Terra have any effect on other people?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: The Resonanz? No.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: As long as it is not deliberately directed, the Voice of Terra's Resonanz should not affect others in any way.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: Then why did Hibiscus see me and Kreide as the source of the false recoveries?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Hibiscus?
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: A Rhodes Island operator dispatched to Vyseheim.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: So Rhodes Island has termed this phenomenon 'false recovery?' A clear and concise description, as you would expect of such professionals.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: You... knew about it after all.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: If you're talking about the anomalies that have been happening to the Infected in the Afterglow recently, then yes, I do know.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: What exactly is going on?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Stated simply, the Voice of Terra within Kreide is damaged.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: Damaged???
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: When you cast Arts, the Voice of Terra inside you will activate, therefore assisting you. Correct?
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: Yes, I do hear a faint, shrill melody as I'm casting Arts. How can something like that be damaged?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Kreide's Voice of Terra has always been in an active state, unlike how you are able to turn yours off.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: In other words, he's been unconsciously casting Arts all around him, with no ability to control it.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: If you ask him, he'd probably tell you that he's always been able to hear some sort of vague melody in his head.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: You can understand this phenomenon as 'leakage.'
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: This 'false recovery' is a product of the Voice of Terra's leakage – indiscriminately increasing the activity of Originium in the surroundings, using the power of Originium to 'heal' the nearby Infected...
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: However, the source of healing energy is taken directly from the Originium within the body of each Infected.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: Using the Infected themselves as Arts devices, using the Originium inside their bodies to enhance their compensatory functions... This is the 'false recovery' caused by Kreide's Voice of Terra.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: Kreide has been in this state for a long, long time, continuously affecting the Infected around him.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: If this has been going on for so long, someone should've figured it out by now!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: The credit for that goes to you, Herr Ebenholz.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: Me?!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Resonanz.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: Resonanz amplifies the leakage of Kreide's Voice of Terra, which is causing an explosion in the recent cases of false recovery?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: That's the situation, yes.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: Alright, I see exactly what's going on now.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I hereby withdraw from your plan.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Freedom is at your fingertips, and you're going to give it up just like that?
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: I'm not crazy enough to buy my freedom with the lives of an entire swath of Infected.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: You've been shaken by that woman from Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: This false recovery is indeed not a good thing, but your concert with Kreide is just a few days away.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: After a few days, your Voice of Terra will be removed, and then you'll leave Vyseheim. Nobody will even notice that we're short of a few Infected.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity. If you walk away now, Graf Urtica's shadow will follow you your entire life.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: Is that what you really want?
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: No, but I won't do that either.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Goodbye, Dame Gertrude.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Where are you going?
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: None of your business.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Your footsteps sound rather unsteady. Are you getting a headache?
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: I already told you...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: It's none of your business!
attributes.name: Ebenholz
